original_title: Brewed In Austin The Zymergence of Craft Beer in Central Texas
overview: A documentary about the explosive growth of craft beer in Austin, Texas. The show explores the short-lived craft beer boom in the 90's, the current growth of craft breweries, flavor and consumer trends, the legal obstacles for Texas breweries and brewpubs, and business challenges new breweries will face.
title: Brewed In Austin The Zymergence of Craft Beer in Central Texas
